abstract: All relevant ethical guidelines have been followed; any necessary IRB and/or ethics committee approvals have been obtained and details of the IRB/oversight body are included in the manuscript.
affiliations: Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital from January 1 to February
Keywords: Coronavirus disease 2019; nutrition; indicies; prognosis
author: Yalei Jin; Li Peng; Mingqi Luo; Harry H.X. Wang; Yan Zhao; Yuwei Liu; ling chen; Zhenshun Cheng; Jing Chen; Xuebei Du
title: Comparison of the Clinical Implications among Two Different Nutritional Indices in Hospitalized Patients with COVID-19

funding.funding-statement: Funding Statement no external funding was received
